summary: Mohammed Shami is an Indian international cricketer.

value.label: Mohammed Shami Ahmed
Amroha
Indian
Bowler
Right-arm fast-medium bowler.
Shami made his first-class debut in 2010 against Assam, picking up three wickets.
The Ranji Trophy is a domestic first-class cricket championship played in India between teams representing regional and state cricket associations.

value.label: Shami made his ODI debut versus Pakistan in 2013.

The Pakistan Men's National Cricket Team, popularly referred to as the Shaheens, Green Shirts and Men in Green, is administered by the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB). The team is a Full Member of the International Cricket Council, and participates in Test, ODI and Twenty20 International cricket matches.

image.altText: Image of Pakistan national cricket team

value.label: Shami made his T20 debut in the opening match of the T20 world cup
Shami picked 4 wickets in the match between Indian and Pakistan
The 2015 ICC Cricket World Cup was the 11th Cricket World Cup, jointly hosted by Australia and New Zealand.
Shami played for the Delhi Daredevils from 2014 to 2018
The Delhi Capitals are a franchise cricket team that represents the city of Delhi in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
Shami picked 5  wickets on his Test debut against West Indies in November 2013

image.altText: Shami picked 5  wickets on his Test debut against West Indies in November 2013

value.label: In 2019, Shami picked up 100 ODIs wickets, fastest to reach this milestone among Indian bowlers

image.altText: In 2019, Shami picked up 100 ODIs wickets, fastest to reach this milestone among Indian bowlers
image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: In 2014, in an Asia cup match against Afghanistan, Shami became the second fastest Indian to take 50 ODI wickets.

image.altText: In 2014, in an Asia cup match against Afghanistan, Shami became the second fastest Indian to take 50 ODI wickets.

value.label: During his debut Test match, Shami picked 9 wickets for 118 runs, the most wickets by an Indian pacer on debut

image.altText: During his debut Test match, Shami picked 9 wickets for 118 runs, the most wickets by an Indian pacer on debut

value.label: Shami was involved in a 111-run partnership for the 10th wicket, with Bhuvneshwar Kumar versus England in 2014

image.altText: Shami was involved in a 111-run partnership for the 10th wicket, with Bhuvneshwar Kumar versus England in 2014

value.label: The India national cricket team is also known as Team India and Men in Blue. India is ranked first in Tests, second in ODIs and second in T20Is by the ICC. Virat Kohli is the current captain of the team, while the head coach is Ravi Shastri.

image.altText: Picture of India national cricket team

value.label: The Kings XI Punjab (KXIP) are a franchise cricket team based in Mohali (Chandigarh CR), Punjab, that plays in the Indian Premier League.
The Bengal cricket team represents the Indian state of West Bengal in domestic first-class cricket.
